doc.title: Ieat Durian Degustation IV: The Aftermath... Burrp!
doc.text: Many/JJ thanks/NNS to/TO all/PDT the/DT ieaters/NN who/WP turned/VBD up/RP for/IN the/DT Durian/NNP Degustation/NNP !/. Although/CC it/PRP was/VBD the/DT end/NN of/IN season/NN ,/, we/PRP still/RB managed/VBD to/TO put/VB up/IN a/DT great/JJ party/NN. and/CC judging/RB from/IN the/DT feedback/NN ,/, it/PRP looks/VBZ like/IN everyone/NN is/VBZ game/JJ for/IN another/DT degustation/JJ when/WRB the/DT next/JJ season/NN starts/NNS in/IN October/NN !/. A/DT big/JJ thank/NN you/PRP to/TO Mr/NNP Goh/NNP ,/, the/DT owner/NN of/IN 717/NN Trading/NN who/WP graciously/VBZ hosted/RB our/JJ event/NN at/IN the/DT very/RB special/JJ price/NN of/IN $/$ 20/CD per/NN pax/NN ./. The/DT value/NN of/IN the/DT durians/NN that/WDT was/VBD provided/VBD that/IN night/NN was/VBD closer/RB to/TO $/$ 40/CD due/JJ to/TO the/DT current/JJ price/NN of/IN durians/NN ./. 717/DT Trading/NN has/VBZ hosted/RB durian/JJ parties/NN of/IN more/NN than/IN 1000/JJ people/NN ,/, so/RB the/DT durian/JJ logistics/NN part/NN was/VBD a/DT breeze/NN ./. I/PRP would/MD highly/RB recommend/VB them/PRP to/TO any/DT corporation/JJ or/CC groups/RB who/WP want/VB to/TO organize/VB their/PRP$ own/JJ parties/NN ./. You/PRP can/MD contact/VB Shann/NNP -LRB-/NNP Lao/NNP Ban/NNP Niang/NNP in/IN the/DT making/VBG -RRB-/NN at/IN 62877717/NN and/CC she/PRP can/MD work/VB with/IN you/PRP on/IN your/PRP$ party/NN. ./. I/PRP also/RB have/VB to/TO thank/VB a/DT whole/JJ bunch/NN of/IN ieatstaff/NN who/WP rallied/VBZ alongside/VBD me/PRP to/TO organize/VB this/DT session/NN ./. I/PRP could/MD n't/RB have/VB done/VBN it/PRP without/IN them/PRP ./. So/RB thanks/NNS to/TO SCS/NNP Butter/NNP -LRB-/NNP Chairman/NNP -RRB-/NNP ,/, Drazreel/NNP -LRB-/NNP Treasurer/NNP -RRB-/NNP ,/, HappiMummi/NNP ,/, Rocket/NNP Girl/NNP -LRB-/NNP previously/VBZ known/VBN as/IN Amagada/JJ -RRB-/NN ,/, PowerAunty/NN and/CC the/DT Power/NN Gang/NN ,/, Holybro/NN ,/, Lovejade/NN ,/, Huijin/NN and/CC the/DT rest/NN of/IN our/PRP$ kakis/NNS who/WP came/VBD to/TO ``/VB connect/NN arm/NN and/CC legs/NNS ''/RB ./. -LRB-/NNP Dao/NNP Ka/NNP Chiu/NNP -RRB-/NNP ./. 717/JJ Trading/NN is/VBZ opening/VBG a/DT new/JJ cafe/NN soon/NN and/CC we/PRP may/MD organize/VB a/DT Durian/NNP Dessert/NNP Degustation/NNP ./. They/PRP tell/VB me/PRP that/IN they/PRP are/VBP investing/VBN in/IN an/DT ice/NN cream/NN machine/NN to/TO make/VB full/JJ use/VB of/IN their/PRP$ excess/NN Mao/NN Shan/NN Wang/NN Durians/NNPS !/. Their/PRP$ pastries/NNS are/VBP made/VBD in/IN support/NN of/IN the/DT Yellow/JJ Ribbon/NN Project/NN and/CC Mr/NN Goh/NN would/MD visit/VB the/DT Prisons/NN to/TO supervise/VB the/DT making/VBG of/IN the/DT pastries/NN as/IN well/RB as/IN to/TO counsel/VB the/DT inmates/NN ./. As/CC I/PRP already/RB mentioned/VBD ,/, the/DT new/JJ Mao/NN Shan/NN Wang/JJ season/NN starts/NNS in/IN October/NN ,/, so/RB we/PRP might/VB be/VB doing/VBG Durian/NNP Deguation/NNP V/NNP -/: ``/. The/DT Return/NN of/IN the/DT Mountain/JJ Cat/NN ''/NN soon/NN ./. All/PDT these/DT sessions/NNS are/VBP organized/JJ for/IN you/PRP ./. So/CC I/PRP need/VBP to/TO know/VB if/IN there/RB is/VBZ sufficient/JJ interest/NN for/IN these/DT events/NN ./. If/IN you/PRP are/VBP interested/JJ to/TO come/VB ,/, please/RB write/VB a/DT comment/NN in/IN this/DT post/NN and/CC indicate/NN if/IN you/PRP are/VBP interested/VBN in/IN the/DT Durian/NNP Dessert/NNP Degustation/NNP or/CC Durian/NNP Degustation/NNP V/NNP or/CC both/DT ./.
